thread.title: BRIEF-Fitbit Announces Global Availability Of Fitbit Versa

title: BRIEF-Fitbit Announces Global Availability Of Fitbit Versa
text:
April 16, 2018 / 1:03 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Fitbit Announces Global Availability Of Fitbit Versa Reuters Staff 
April 16 (Reuters) - Fitbit Inc: * FITBIT ANNOUNCES GLOBAL AVAILABILITY OF FITBIT VERSA 
* FITBIT INC - ANNOUNCED AVAILABILITY OF FITBIT VERSA AT MAJOR RETAILERS WORLDWIDE FOR $199.95 
* FITBIT INC - FEMALE HEALTH TRACKING COMING TO ENTIRE FITBIT PLATFORM STARTING IN MAY 
* FITBIT INC - FITBIT PAY ADDS CHASE TO EXISTING BANK AND CARD ISSUERS AMERICAN EXPRESS, BANK OF AMERICA, CAPITAL ONE, U.S. BANK AND WELLS FARGO IN U.S. 
* FITBIT INC - QUICK REPLIES TO MOBILE DEVICE MESSAGES AVAILABLE FOR ANDROID USERS IN MAY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
